summary: SummaryHighlightsCruelty FreeGrande Cosmetics' GrandeVANISH Bi-Phase Makeup Remover is a gentle bi-phase makeup remover that makes long-wear and waterproof makeup vanish without a trace.
details: DetailsBenefitsNon-greasy & non-irritatingWorks without pulling on lashes or causing lash falloutSuitable for all skin types including sensitive & contact lens wearersMoisturizingParaben-free, sulfate-free, alcohol-freeDermatologist testedItem 2612159How To UseShake well. Saturate a cotton pad. Press & hold to soften makeup. Swipe until makeup is fully removed.IngredientsWater, Cyclopentasiloxane, Isoeicosane, C13-15 Alkane, Cucumis Sativus Fruit Extract, Isohexadecane, Butylene Glycol, Dimethicone, Simmondsia Chinensis Seed Oil, Hexapeptide-11, Chlorella Pyrenoidosa Extract, Laminaria Saccharina Extract, C12-15 Alkyl Benzoate, Undaria Pinnatifida Extract, Saccharomyces/Carrageenan Extract/Sarcodiotheca Gaudichaudii Extract Ferment, Neopentyl Glycol Diethylhexanoate, Propylene Glycol, Ethylhexylglycerin, Magnesium Sulfate, Maris Sal, Sorbitan Oleate, Potassium Benzoate, Potassium Sorbate, Phenoxyethanol, Disodium EDTA, Citric Acid.Shipping & Coupon RestrictionsThis brand is excluded from most Ulta Beauty coupons.See brand eligibility details
how_to_use: Shake well. Saturate a cotton pad. Press & hold to soften makeup. Swipe until makeup is fully removed.

reviews.headline: Deserves to be in store!
reviews.comments:
Greatest product ever created! 
Removing makeup while leaving the face hydrated and never gives the oily finishing texture. 
Ex: Clinique Take The Day Off & Garnier

As an ulta associate I wish I could reorder. Alas, associate discounts stopped for online purchases which leaves me to join a journey for another substitute in store. Would reccomend every online shopper to purchase and I wish for the possibility of the item to become added in line (for us to sell) in the futureüôèüèº‚ô•Ô∏è

reviews.headline: Difficult to remove
reviews.comments: Super thick formula, was upset by how hard i had to work to get it off my eyes. My poor skin‚Ä¶ got a free sample, immediately went in the trash after one use, definitely not passing this on to someone else.

reviews.headline: Amazing!!
reviews.comments: Ive been known to skip out on the makeup purely because I wont want to deal with taking it off later. Ive tried a few different removers, with my most recent favorite being a homemade remover (kinda scary, I know). Then I saw the reviews for this and figured might as well try it. Holy crap, its fantastic!!! I absolutely hate the way most makeup removers make my eyes sting, how much I lose lashes, and it feels like I can never truly get all the makeup off. This stuff works like a charm, even on my waterproof/stubborn makeup. I dont know if "cushiony" is the right word, but it feels right. Theres something about this formula that is just so soothing. Im sold. Worth. Every. Penny.

reviews.headline: I love the product
reviews.comments: I didn't had and harsh chemicals in it for my skin !

reviews.headline: I would buy this product again
reviews.comments: I love this product! If you are looking for a good waterproof makeup remover this is my go-to. I got this product because I love GrandeLash, and the remover did not disappoint.

reviews.headline: Best makeup remover I have tried!
reviews.comments:
Not only is this makeup remover hydrating on the skin, it is also not greasy! I can't stand the feeling of the average makeup remover, but this one is a win for me. It removed my full face on one cotton round. A must buy!
Gifted by Grande Cosmetics

reviews.headline: LOVE LOVE LOVE
reviews.comments: I have a hard time with makeup remover because it never removes all of my mascara. This stuff however takes my makeup so easily and it doesn't irritate my eyes or skin. I absolutely love it!

reviews.headline: Easy to use, great choice
reviews.comments: Easy of skin, Tough on Makeup, making it an easy addition to my skincare routine. I feel confident using it knowing it's well in ingredients and going to leave my skin makeup and residue free.

reviews.headline: Removes makeup well
reviews.comments: I received this complimentary in exchange for my review - I liked this makeup remover it removed my massacra and waterproof eyeliner well but it is pricey

reviews.headline: Its great!
reviews.comments: This make up remover is great I use water proof mascara and it removes my mascara really well and also my eyeshadow it doesn't make my eyes hurt my natural eyelashes don't fall when I use this make up remover. &also it isn't greasy

reviews.headline: My new holy grail!!
reviews.comments:
This makeup remover y'all!! It's literally so lightweight on my skin but still does its job, I'm mind-blown! I've tried so many makeup removers and this is the only one that doesn't feel greasy on my skin afterwards. I've recently been on a lash journey and trying to grow my lashes out and this product did not mess with them at all. It removed my mascara without pulling or damaging my eyelashes! It also made my skin feel super hydrated and nourished afterwards which is super rare, and I think it's because it doesn't contain any alcohol. If you're on the hunt for a makeup remover that actually works, this is the one! 10/10 recommend!
Gifted by Grande Cosmetics

reviews.headline: I love this makeup remover!!!
reviews.comments:
I love how this takes my makeup off easy without irritating my sensitive skin! This leaves my skin feeling clean and refreshed. The jojoba oil makes my skin feel very soft and not greasy feeling! 

Gifted by Grande Cosmetics

reviews.headline: I absolutely love this product!!!
reviews.comments: This product effortlessly removes makeup without pulling or causing lash fallout. It is definitely hydrating and nourishing to the skin. I love how it is non-greasy and non-irritating. And it's also perfect for the girlies with sensitive skin.

reviews.headline: Definitely non-greasy and non-irritating
reviews.comments: This amazing product effortlessly removes makeup without pulling, or causing lash fallout. I love how it is so hydrating and nourishing, and it is non-greasy and non-irritating as well. And it's so also perfect for those girlies with sensitive.

reviews.headline: A NEED
reviews.comments:
Effortlessly removes makeup without pulling, tugging or causing lash fallout. It is also very Hydrating and has nourishing skincare benefits! 
One thing i do agree with about Grande Cosmetics and this product is that it is dermatologist approved

reviews.headline: Gentle and actually removes!
reviews.comments: For years, I have found micellular water as the only effective method for me to remove eye makeup. But not anymore! This actually removed every last bit of mascara (and I use a lot.) It was also very gentle and I did not lose any lashes in the process, nor did my eyes get cloudy. Thanks to this product I have a new removal routine!

reviews.headline: Gentle and actually removes makeup!
reviews.comments: For years, the only effective way I could find to remove my mascara was micellular water on a makeup wipe. But not anymore! I wear a lot of mascara and this was able to remove every last bit from my lashes. Its super gentle, I didnt lose any lashes from the removal, and it didnt make my eyes cloudy. This product has surprised me and now I have a new makeup removal routine!

reviews.headline: removes waterproof!
reviews.comments: It removed waterproof mascara perfectly and it felt like it was less damaging to my lashes and brows than other makeup removers. love.

reviews.headline: CURRENT MUST HAVE
reviews.comments: Currently in love with the grande cosmetics vanish bi phase makeup remover! I love that it's very gentle on my skin while being able to take off all the makeup I have on all at once. Thank you grande for gifting me this I will definitely keep restocking

reviews.headline: I love this makeup remover!!!
reviews.comments: I love this awesome product that takes my makeup off easy without irritating my sensitive skin! This leaves my skin feeling clean and refreshed! The jojoba oil makes my skin feel very soft and not greasy feeling!

I've recently been on a lash journey and trying to grow my lashes out and this product did not mess with them at all. It removed my mascara without pulling or damaging my eyelashes! It also made my skin feel super hydrated and nourished afterwards which is super rare, and I think it's because it doesn't contain any alcohol. If you're on the hunt for a makeup remover that actually works, this is the one! 10/10 recommend!
Gifted by Grande Cosmetics
